verses.verse: וּבֹ֨עַז <S%H1162><s%> Boaz עָלָ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> up הַשַּׁעַר֮ <S%H8179><s%> to the gate וַיֵּ֣שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> and sat him down שָׁם֒ <S%H8033><s%> there וְהִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold הַגֹּאֵ֤ל <S%H1350><s%> there and behold the kinsman עֹבֵר֙ <S%H5674><s%> came אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> of whom דִּבֶּר־ <S%H1696><s%> spake בֹּ֔עַז <S%H1162><s%> of whom Boaz וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <S%H559><s%> by unto whom he said ס֥וּרָה <S%H5493><s%> turn aside שְׁבָה־ <S%H3427><s%> sit down פֹּ֖ה <S%H6311><s%> here פְּלֹנִ֣י <S%H6423><s%> such אַלְמֹנִ֑י <S%H492><s%> a one וַיָּ֖סַר <S%H5493><s%> here And he turned aside וַיֵּשֵֽׁב׃ <S%H3427><s%> and sat down

וַיִּקַּ֞ח <S%H3947><s%> And he took עֲשָׂרָ֧ה <S%H6235><s%> ten אֲנָשִׁ֛ים <S%H582><s%> men מִזִּקְנֵ֥י <S%H2205><s%> of the elders הָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> of the city וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said שְׁבוּ־ <S%H3427><s%> Sit ye down פֹ֑ה <S%H6311><s%> here וַיֵּשֵֽׁבוּ׃ <S%H3427><s%> here And they sat down

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> And he said לַגֹּאֵ֔ל <S%H1350><s%> unto the kinsman חֶלְקַת֙ <S%H2513><s%> a parcel הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> out of the country אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which לְאָחִ֖ינוּ <S%H251><s%> which [was] our brother לֶאֱלִימֶ֑לֶךְ <S%H458><s%> Elimelech's מָכְרָ֣ה <S%H4376><s%> selleth נָעֳמִ֔י <S%H5281><s%> Naomi הַשָּׁ֖בָה <S%H7725><s%> that is come again מִשְּׂדֵ֥ה <S%H7704><s%> of land מוֹאָֽב׃ <S%H4124><s%> of Moab

וַאֲנִ֨י <S%H589><s%> I אָמַ֜רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> And I thought אֶגְלֶ֧ה <S%H1540><s%> advertise אָזְנְךָ֣ <S%H241><s%> you לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> thee saying קְ֠נֵה <S%H7069><s%> Buy נֶ֥גֶד <S%H5048><s%> before הַֽיֹּשְׁבִים֮ <S%H3427><s%> [it] before the inhabitants וְנֶ֣גֶד <S%H5048><s%> and before זִקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> and before the elders עַמִּי֒ <S%H5971><s%> of my people אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If תִּגְאַל֙ <S%H1350><s%> If thou wilt redeem גְּאָ֔ל <S%H1350><s%> [it] redeem וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if לֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> not יִגְאַ֜ל <S%H1350><s%> [it] but if thou wilt not redeem הַגִּ֣ידָה <S%H5046><s%> [it then] tell לִּ֗י [וְאֵדַע כ] (וְאֵֽדְעָה֙ <S%H3045><s%> acknowledge ק) כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אֵ֤ין <S%H369><s%> there זוּלָֽתְךָ֙ <S%H2108><s%> [it] beside לִגְא֔וֹל <S%H1350><s%> for [there is] none to redeem וְאָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> I אַחֲרֶ֑יךָ <S%H310><s%> thee and I [am] after וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> thee And he said אָנֹכִ֥י <S%H595><s%> I אֶגְאָֽל׃ <S%H1350><s%> I will redeem

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said בֹּ֔עַז <S%H1162><s%> Boaz בְּיוֹם־ <S%H3117><s%> What day קְנוֹתְךָ֥ <S%H7069><s%> thou buyest הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <S%H7704><s%> the field מִיַּ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> of the hand נָעֳמִ֑י <S%H5281><s%> of Naomi וּ֠מֵאֵת <S%H854><s%> for ר֣וּת <S%H7327><s%> [it] also of Ruth הַמּוֹאֲבִיָּ֤ה <S%H4125><s%> the Moabitess אֵֽשֶׁת־ <S%H802><s%> the wife הַמֵּת֙ <S%H4191><s%> of the dead [קָנִיתִי כ] (קָנִ֔יתָה <S%H7069><s%> buy ק) לְהָקִ֥ים <S%H6965><s%> to raise up שֵׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> the name הַמֵּ֖ת <S%H4191><s%> of the dead עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on נַחֲלָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H5159><s%> upon his inheritance

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הַגֹּאֵ֗ל <S%H1350><s%> And the kinsman לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not אוּכַל֙ <S%H3201><s%> I cannot [לִגְאֹול־ כ] (לִגְאָל־ <S%H1350><s%> Redeem ק) <S%H1350><s%> redeem פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> because אַשְׁחִ֖ית <S%H7843><s%> [it] for myself lest I mar אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַחֲלָתִ֑י <S%H5159><s%> mine own inheritance גְּאַל־ <S%H1350><s%> redeem לְךָ֤ אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> you אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גְּאֻלָּתִ֔י <S%H1353><s%> thou my right כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אוּכַ֖ל <S%H3201><s%> to thyself for I cannot לִגְאֹֽל׃ <S%H1350><s%> redeem

וְזֹאת֩ <S%H2063><s%> in לְפָנִ֨ים <S%H6440><s%> Now this [was the manner] in former time בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <S%H3478><s%> in Israel עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning הַגְּאוּלָּ֤ה <S%H1353><s%> concerning redeeming וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning הַתְּמוּרָה֙ <S%H8545><s%> and concerning changing לְקַיֵּ֣ם <S%H6965><s%> for to confirm כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any דָּבָ֔ר <S%H1697><s%> all things שָׁלַ֥ף <S%H8025><s%> plucked off אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> a man נַעֲל֖וֹ <S%H5275><s%> his shoe וְנָתַ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> and gave לְרֵעֵ֑הוּ <S%H7453><s%> [it] to his neighbour וְזֹ֥את <S%H2063><s%> was the הַתְּעוּדָ֖ה <S%H8584><s%> and this [was] a testimony בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> in Israel

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הַגֹּאֵ֛ל <S%H1350><s%> Therefore the kinsman לְבֹ֖עַז <S%H1162><s%> unto Boaz קְנֵה־ <S%H7069><s%> Buy לָ֑ךְ וַיִּשְׁלֹ֖ף <S%H8025><s%> [it] for thee So he drew off נַעֲלֽוֹ׃ <S%H5275><s%> his shoe

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> said בֹּ֨עַז <S%H1162><s%> And Boaz לַזְּקֵנִ֜ים <S%H2205><s%> unto the elders וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> and [unto] all the people עֵדִ֤ים <S%H5707><s%> Ye [are] witnesses אַתֶּם֙ <S%H859><s%> you הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> this day כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for קָנִ֙יתִי֙ <S%H7069><s%> that I have bought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> that לֶֽאֱלִימֶ֔לֶךְ <S%H458><s%> all that [was] Elimelech's וְאֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> that לְכִלְי֖וֹן <S%H3630><s%> and all that [was] Chilion's וּמַחְל֑וֹן <S%H4248><s%> and Mahlon's מִיַּ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> of the hand נָעֳמִֽי׃ <S%H5281><s%> of Naomi

וְגַ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> Moreover אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ר֣וּת <S%H7327><s%> Moreover Ruth הַמֹּאֲבִיָּה֩ <S%H4125><s%> the Moabitess אֵ֨שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> the wife מַחְל֜וֹן <S%H4248><s%> of Mahlon קָנִ֧יתִי <S%H7069><s%> have I purchased לִ֣י לְאִשָּׁ֗ה <S%H802><s%> to be my wife לְהָקִ֤ים <S%H6965><s%> to raise up שֵׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> the name הַמֵּת֙ <S%H4191><s%> of the dead עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on נַ֣חֲלָת֔וֹ <S%H5159><s%> upon his inheritance וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יִכָּרֵ֧ת <S%H3772><s%> be not cut off שֵׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> that the name הַמֵּ֛ת <S%H4191><s%> of the dead מֵעִ֥ם <S%H5973><s%> from among אֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> his brethren וּמִשַּׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> and from the gate מְקוֹמ֑וֹ <S%H4725><s%> of his place עֵדִ֥ים <S%H5707><s%> ye [are] witnesses אַתֶּ֖ם <S%H859><s%> you הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> this day

וַיֹּ֨אמְר֜וּ <S%H559><s%> said כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All הָעָ֧ם <S%H5971><s%> And all the people אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who בַּשַּׁ֛עַר <S%H8179><s%> that [were] in the gate וְהַזְּקֵנִ֖ים <S%H2205><s%> and the elders עֵדִ֑ים <S%H5707><s%> [We are] witnesses יִתֵּן֩ <S%H5414><s%> make יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאִשָּׁ֜ה <S%H802><s%> the woman הַבָּאָ֣ה <S%H935><s%> that is come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into בֵּיתֶ֗ךָ <S%H1004><s%> into thine house כְּרָחֵ֤ל ׀ <S%H7354><s%> like Rachel וּכְלֵאָה֙ <S%H3812><s%> and like Leah אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> of whom בָּנ֤וּ <S%H1129><s%> did build שְׁתֵּיהֶם֙ <S%H8147><s%> which two אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַעֲשֵׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> and do חַ֣יִל <S%H2428><s%> thou worthily בְּאֶפְרָ֔תָה <S%H672><s%> in Ephratah וּקְרָא־ <S%H7121><s%> and become שֵׁ֖ם <S%H8034><s%> base בְּבֵ֥ית לָֽחֶם׃ <S%H1035><s%> in Bethlehem

וִיהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> become בֵֽיתְךָ֙ <S%H1004><s%> And let thy house כְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> be like the house פֶּ֔רֶץ <S%H6557><s%> of Pharez אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom יָלְדָ֥ה <S%H3205><s%> bare תָמָ֖ר <S%H8559><s%> whom Tamar לִֽיהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> unto Judah מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> through הַזֶּ֗רַע <S%H2233><s%> of the seed אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which יִתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> shall give יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD לְךָ֔ מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> through הַֽנַּעֲרָ֖ה <S%H5291><s%> thee of this young woman הַזֹּֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> likewise

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <S%H3947><s%> took בֹּ֤עַז <S%H1162><s%> So Boaz אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רוּת֙ <S%H7327><s%> Ruth וַתְּהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> became ל֣וֹ לְאִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> and she was his wife וַיָּבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> and when he went in אֵלֶ֑יהָ <S%H413><s%> about וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> gave יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> unto her the LORD לָ֛הּ הֵרָי֖וֹן <S%H2032><s%> her conception וַתֵּ֥לֶד <S%H3205><s%> and she bare בֵּֽן׃ <S%H1121><s%> a son

וַתֹּאמַ֤רְנָה <S%H559><s%> said הַנָּשִׁים֙ <S%H802><s%> And the women אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to נָעֳמִ֔י <S%H5281><s%> unto Naomi בָּר֣וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> Blessed יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> [be] the LORD אֲ֠שֶׁר <S%H834><s%> who לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> has not הִשְׁבִּ֥ית <S%H7673><s%> which hath not left לָ֛ךְ גֹּאֵ֖ל <S%H1350><s%> without a kinsman הַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> thee this day וְיִקָּרֵ֥א <S%H7121><s%> may be famous שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> that his name בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> in Israel

וְהָ֤יָה <S%H1961><s%> become לָךְ֙ לְמֵשִׁ֣יב <S%H7725><s%> And he shall be unto thee a restorer נֶ֔פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> of [thy] life וּלְכַלְכֵּ֖ל <S%H3557><s%> and a nourisher אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֵׂיבָתֵ֑ךְ <S%H7872><s%> of thine old age כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for כַלָּתֵ֤ךְ <S%H3618><s%> for thy daughter in law אֲ‍ֽשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who אֲהֵבַ֙תֶךְ֙ <S%H157><s%> which loveth יְלָדַ֔תּוּ <S%H3205><s%> hath born אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who הִיא֙ <S%H1931><s%> and is ט֣וֹבָה <S%H2896><s%> thee which is better לָ֔ךְ מִשִּׁבְעָ֖ה <S%H7651><s%> to thee than seven בָּנִֽים׃ <S%H1121><s%> sons

וַתִּקַּ֨ח <S%H3947><s%> took נָעֳמִ֤י <S%H5281><s%> And Naomi אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיֶּ֙לֶד֙ <S%H3206><s%> the child וַתְּשִׁתֵ֣הוּ <S%H7896><s%> and laid בְחֵיקָ֔הּ <S%H2436><s%> it in her bosom וַתְּהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> and became ל֖וֹ לְאֹמֶֽנֶת׃ <S%H539><s%> and became nurse

וַתִּקְרֶאנָה֩ <S%H7121><s%> gave ל֨וֹ הַשְּׁכֵנ֥וֹת <S%H7934><s%> And the women her neighbours שֵׁם֙ <S%H8034><s%> it a name לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying יֻלַּד־ <S%H3205><s%> born בֵּ֖ן <S%H1121><s%> There is a son לְנָעֳמִ֑י <S%H5281><s%> to Naomi וַתִּקְרֶ֤אנָֽה <S%H7121><s%> and they called שְׁמוֹ֙ <S%H8034><s%> his name עוֹבֵ֔ד <S%H5744><s%> Obed ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> He אֲבִי־ <S%H1><s%> he [is] the father יִשַׁ֖י <S%H3448><s%> of Jesse אֲבִ֥י <S%H1><s%> the father דָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> of David פ

וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> now these תּוֹלְד֣וֹת <S%H8435><s%> Now these [are] the generations פָּ֔רֶץ <S%H6557><s%> of Pharez פֶּ֖רֶץ <S%H6557><s%> Pharez הוֹלִ֥יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֶצְרֽוֹן׃ <S%H2696><s%> Hezron

וְחֶצְרוֹן֙ <S%H2696><s%> And Hezron הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רָ֔ם <S%H7410><s%> Ram וְרָ֖ם <S%H7410><s%> and Ram הוֹלִ֥יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמִּֽינָדָֽב׃ <S%H5992><s%> Amminadab
